conclusion: Analyze forces on wire ab in magnetic field with current.
Magnetic force on wire given by F = I L x B.
Magnetic field B is into the plane; current I flows from a to b.
Using right-hand rule, force F is downward when current I flows from a to b.
When current is reversed to 2I, force F is upward.
For current I from a to b, total force is F1 = mg + BIL.
For current 2I from b to a, total force is F2 = mg - 2BIL.
Magnitude of magnetic induction intensity B is (F1 - F2) / (3IL).
